function createSign(params) {
	var str = '';
	Object.keys(params).sort().forEach((key) => {
		if (params[key]) {
			str += `&${key}=${params[key]}`;
		}
	});
	return CryptoJS.HmacMD5(str.slice(1), 'c17DTXDNhSc0ea9AQMdUUQ==').toString();
}

const timestamp = Date.now();
let url = "https://api.next.bspapp.com/client";
let body = {
	"method": "serverless.auth.user.anonymousAuthorize",
	"params": "{}",
	"spaceId": "mp-a23ce835-47fc-4856-9c1a-5648136d3829",
	"timestamp": timestamp
};

let sign = createSign(body);

	"Content-Type": "application/json",
	"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 6.0; Nexus 5 Build/MRA58N) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/129.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
	"x-serverless-sign": sign
};

let response = JSON.parse(java.post("https://api.next.bspapp.com/client",JSON.stringify(body),headers).body());

					{ "$method": "field", "$param": ["_id,cover_url,title,tags,word_number,view_count,excerpt,introduction,creator_id,creator_name,creator_avatar,is_completed,novel_status,contributor"] },
					{ "$method": "skip", "$param": [0] },
					{ "$method": "limit", "$param": [20] },
					{ "$method": "get", "$param": [{}] }
				]
			}
		}
	});
	let body1 = {
		"method": "serverless.function.runtime.invoke",
		"params": params,
		"spaceId": "mp-a23ce835-47fc-4856-9c1a-5648136d3829",
		"timestamp": timestamp1,
		"token": accessToken
	};
	let sign1 = createSign(body1);
	let headers1 = {
		"Content-Type": "application/json",
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 6.0; Nexus 5 Build/MRA58N) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/129.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",

	};
	let response1 = JSON.parse(java.post("https://api.next.bspapp.com/client",JSON.stringify(body1),headers1).body());

			{ "$method": "field", "$param": ["_id,chapter_title,last_modify_date"] },
			{ "$method": "orderBy", "$param": ["chapter_index asc"] },

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
     Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.java.util 
);
with(javaImport){
    let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b");
    let ALGORITHM = "DES"; 
    let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding";
    let CHARSET = "utf-8";
    let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN");


function decode(data){
let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes());
let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks);
let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM);
let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET));
cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv);
return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET);

}
}

ruleContent.content:
<js>
z = source.getVariable().split(",");
if(!(parseInt(z[0])>0)){
  let regex = /var c="([^"]*)"/;
let dd = result.match(regex)[1]

let j = java.base64Decode(dd);
  //java.log(j)
  jja=String(j).replace(/^[^-]*-/,"-")
  if(/=/.test(jja)){jj=jja.replace(/=[^=]*$/,"");}else{jj=jja.replace(/_[^_]*$/,"");}
  
m=jj.replace(/-/g,"PHA+").replace(/_/g,"8L3A+");
n=java.getString("@@#chaptercontent@p@html");
n+	java.base64Decode(m)

  
}else if(parseInt(z[0])){
  src=eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
result=java.getString("id.chaptercontent@html",src)
result
}

</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
function setArgument(key, value) {
    let open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument,'');
    open_argument[key] = value;
    open_argument = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(open_argument);
    return open_argument;
}

function gets_key() {
    var servers = String(source.bookSourceUrl);
    const serverList = servers.split('\n');
    
    for (let server of serverList) {
        let keys = String(cookie.getCookie(server)) || String(java.getCookie(server));
        if (keys) {
            let keyParts = keys.split('secretKey=');
            if (keyParts.length > 1) {
                keys = keyParts[keyParts.length - 1];
                setArgument('key', keys);
                return keys;
            }
        }
    }
    return '';  
 }

let open_argument = source.getVariable();
let base_url = getArguments(open_argument,'server');
let ms = getArguments(open_argument,'tone_id');
let key = getArguments(open_argument,'key');
if (!key) {
	key = gets_key();
	}

function login() {
	let loginName = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("é‚®ç®±");
	let password = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("å¯†ç ");
	if (loginName && password) {
		let body = `loginName=${loginName}&password=${password}`;
		let url = source.bookSourceUrl + 'api/console/app/login';
		let res = java.post(url, body, {});
		let responseBody = JSON.parse(res.body());
		if (responseBody.result == "fail") {
			throw new Error(responseBody.msg)
		} else {
			let header = JSON.stringify({
				"token": responseBody.model.token,
				"uaa-userid": responseBody.model.id,
			});
			source.putLoginHeader(header);
		}
	}
}
//è´¦å·æ³¨å†Œ
function registerAccount() {
	let loginName = result.get("é‚®ç®±");
	let password = result.get("å¯†ç ");
	let checkCode = result.get("é‚®ç®±éªŒè¯ç ");
	if (loginName && password && checkCode) {
		let body =  `loginName=${loginName}&password=${password}&nickName=&checkCode=${checkCode}&recommendCode=`;
		let url = source.bookSourceUrl + 'api/console/app/register';
		let res = java.post(url, body, {});

function setExcludeTags(tag) {
	let data = getData();
	if (!data.ExcludeTags) data.ExcludeTags = [];
	let index = data.ExcludeTags.findIndex(item => item == tag);
	if (index == -1) {

	} else {

	java.toast(`æ ‡ç­¾ ${tag} å·²${index == -1 ? "æ·»åŠ ": "ç§»é™¤" }å±è”½`);
	setData(data);
}

function setArgument(key, value) {
    let open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument,'');
    open_argument[key] = value;
    open_argument = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(open_argument);
    return open_argument;
}

function gets_key() {
    var servers = String(source.bookSourceUrl);
    const serverList = servers.split('\n');
    
    for (let server of serverList) {
        let key = String(cookie.getCookie(server)) || String(java.getCookie(server));
        if (key) {
            let keyParts = key.split('secretKey=');
            if (keyParts.length > 1) {
                key = keyParts[keyParts.length - 1];
                setArgument('key', key);
                return key;
            }
        }
    }
    return '';

function setArgument(key, value) {
    let open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument,'');
    open_argument[key] = value;
    open_argument = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(open_argument);
    return open_argument;
}

function gets_key() {
    var servers = String(source.bookSourceUrl);
    const serverList = servers.split('\n');
    
    for (let server of serverList) {
        let keys = String(cookie.getCookie(server)) || String(java.getCookie(server));
        if (keys) {
            let keyParts = keys.split('secretKey=');
            if (keyParts.length > 1) {
                keys = keyParts[keyParts.length - 1];
                setArgument('key', keys);
                return keys;
            }
        }
    }
    return '';  
 }

function setArgument(key, value) {
    let open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument,'');
    open_argument[key] = value;
    open_argument = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(open_argument);
    return open_argument;
}

function gets_key() {
    var servers = String(source.bookSourceUrl);
    const serverList = servers.split('\n');
    
    for (let server of serverList) {
        let keys = String(cookie.getCookie(server)) || String(java.getCookie(server));
        if (keys) {
            let keyParts = keys.split('secretKey=');
            if (keyParts.length > 1) {
                keys = keyParts[keyParts.length - 1];
                setArgument('key', keys);
                return keys;
            }
        }
    }
    return '';  
 }

searchUrl:
<js> 
var url = baseUrl;
if (!baseUrl.match(/^https?:/i)) {
    java.log('\n\n\n\nâ€¼ï¸è¯·å¡«å…¥æ­£ç¡®çš„Urlâ€¼ï¸\n\n\n\n');
}
var html = java.ajax(url + ",{'webView': true}");
//java.log(html);
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var form = doc.select('form[action]:not([name~=login]):not([class~=login]):not([id~=login])')[0];
//java.log(form);
var method = form.attr('method');
var action = form.attr('action');
var charset = doc.select('head>meta[charset]').attr('charset');
if (charset == '')
{
    charset = String(doc.select('head>meta[content~=charset=]').attr('content')).replace(/^.*charset=([a-z0-9\-]+).*$/i, 
    '$1');
}
//java.log(method);
//java.log(action);
//java.log(charset);
//æ¡Œé¢ç‰ˆUA
var uaw = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36";
//æ‰‹æœºç‰ˆUA
var uam = "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)";
var headers = {
    //è¯·è‡ªè¡Œé€‰æ‹©UAï¼Œâ†“â†“â†“å¡«å…¥æ­¤å¤„
    "User-Agent" : uaw, "Referer" : String(baseUrl)
};
url = baseUrl.replace(/([^\/])$/i, '$1/') + String(action).replace(/^\//, '');
var body = '';
var option = {};
var sk = form.select('input[name][type="text"],input[name][class="text"]').attr('name');
//java.log(sk);
var es = form.select('input[name]:not([type="submit"])');
for (var it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.attr('value');
    if (k == sk) {
        //body+=sk+'={{java.encodeURI(key,\''+ charset+'\');}}&';
        body += sk + '={{key}}&';
    }
    else {
        body += k + '=' + v + '&';
    }
}
es = form.select('select[name]');
for (it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.select('option')[0].attr('value');
    body += k + '=' + v + '&';
}
body = String(body).replace(/&$/, '');
java.log(body);
if (method.match(/post/i))
{
    option = 
    {
        "charset" : String(charset), "method" : String(method), "body" : String(body), "headers" : headers, 
        "webView" : true 
    };
    url += ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
else
{
    //get
    option = {
        "charset" : String(charset), "headers" : headers, "webView" : true 
    };
    url += '?' + body + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
java.log(url);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
info = JSON.parse(result).data.content;
result=JSON.parse(decode(info));

source_url = baseUrl.replace('/details/','/source/');
source_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(source_url)).data.content;
$ = JSON.parse(decode(source_info));

v=String(book.getVariable("custom"));
x=v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:0;
x=parseInt(x)<$.length?x:0;

result.updated_at = $[x].updated_at;
result.last_chapter_name = $[x].last_chapter_name;
result.tocUrl = source.getKey().replace('//s','//catalog')+"/"+$[x].site_path;
result.image = source.getKey().replace('//s','//res') + '/'+result.image;


if($.length>1){
		y = '\nğŸ“Œä½¿ç”¨è¯´æ˜ï¼š æ ¹æ®åºå·è®¾ç½®ä¹¦ç±å˜é‡æ¥åˆ‡æ¢æ¥æº(é»˜è®¤0)\nğŸ¯å½“å‰æºï¼šåºå·ğŸ”º'+x+'ğŸ”»ã€'+$[x].site_name+'ã€‘'+(x==0?' (é»˜è®¤)':'');
for(i in $){
		y += '\nâ¤åºå·ğŸ”º'+i+'ğŸ”»ã€'+$[i].site_name+'ã€‘ \né€‰ç”¨ç‡ï¼š'+$[i].choose+' \næ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´ï¼š '+$[i].updated_at+'\næœ€æ–°ç« èŠ‚ï¼š '+$[i].last_chapter_name;
	}
result.remark += y
}


result = JSON.stringify(result);
</js>

var nums = 4 ;
//åˆ†éš”ç¬¦
var separator = '::'

//æ ‡é¢˜::é“¾æ¥::ä¸€è¡Œä¸ªæ•°::åˆ†ç±»

all=[
"----------     ğŸ·æ ‡ç­¾     ----------::::1",
"è¿›å‡»çš„å·¨äºº::è¿›å‡»çš„å·¨äºº::::a"
];

//@å¤©å¤©gg@é…·å®‰ ä¸‹é¢ä¸è¦åŠ¨
function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	
	//é“¾æ¥ç”Ÿæˆ
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"https://zhidao.baidu.com/msearch/ajax/getsearchlist?word="+url+"&pn=10":url;
 try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];
 u=tag=="a"?'https://zhidao.baidu.com/msearch/ajax/getsearchlist?word='+url+'&pn=10':u;

 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//æ•°å€¼è®¾å®š

obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
     Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.java.util 
);
with(javaImport){
    let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b");
    let ALGORITHM = "DES"; 
    let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding";
    let CHARSET = "utf-8";
    let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN");


function decode(data){
let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes());
let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks);
let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM);
let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET));
cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv);
return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET);

}
}

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

header:
<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

//md5åŠ å¯†å¼€å§‹
var rotateLeft = function(lValue, iShiftBits) {
    return (lValue << iShiftBits) | (lValue >>> (32 - iShiftBits))
}
var addUnsigned = function(lX, lY) {
    var lX4, lY4, lX8, lY8, lResult;
    lX8 = (lX & 0x80000000);
    lY8 = (lY & 0x80000000);
    lX4 = (lX & 0x40000000);
    lY4 = (lY & 0x40000000);
    lResult = (lX & 0x3FFFFFFF) + (lY & 0x3FFFFFFF);
    if (lX4 & lY4) return (lResult ^ 0x80000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
    if (lX4 | lY4) {
        if (lResult & 0x40000000) return (lResult ^ 0xC0000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8);
        else return (lResult ^ 0x40000000 ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    } else {
        return (lResult ^ lX8 ^ lY8)
    }
}
var F = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x & y) | ((~x) & z)
}
var G = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x & z) | (y & (~z))
}
var H = function(x, y, z) {
    return (x ^ y ^ z)
}
var I = function(x, y, z) {
    return (y ^ (x | (~z)))
}
var FF = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(F(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var GG = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(G(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var HH = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(H(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var II = function(a, b, c, d, x, s, ac) {
    a = addUnsigned(a, addUnsigned(addUnsigned(I(b, c, d), x), ac));
    return addUnsigned(rotateLeft(a, s), b)
};
var convertToWordArray = function(string) {
    var lWordCount;
    var lMessageLength = string.length;
    var lNumberOfWordsTempOne = lMessageLength + 8;
    var lNumberOfWordsTempTwo = (lNumberOfWordsTempOne - (lNumberOfWordsTempOne % 64)) / 64;
    var lNumberOfWords = (lNumberOfWordsTempTwo + 1) * 16;
    var lWordArray = Array(lNumberOfWords - 1);
    var lBytePosition = 0;
    var lByteCount = 0;
    while (lByteCount < lMessageLength) {
        lWordCount = (lByteCount - (lByteCount % 4)) / 4;
        lBytePosition = (lByteCount % 4) * 8;
        lWordArray[lWordCount] = (lWordArray[lWordCount] | (string.charCodeAt(lByteCount) << lBytePosition));
        lByteCount++
    }
    lWordCount = (lByteCount - (lByteCount % 4)) / 4;
    lBytePosition = (lByteCount % 4) * 8;
    lWordArray[lWordCount] = lWordArray[lWordCount] | (0x80 << lBytePosition);
    lWordArray[lNumberOfWords - 2] = lMessageLength << 3;
    lWordArray[lNumberOfWords - 1] = lMessageLength >>> 29;
    return lWordArray
};
var wordToHex = function(lValue) {
    var WordToHexValue = "",
    WordToHexValueTemp = "",
    lByte, lCount;
    for (lCount = 0; lCount <= 3; lCount++) {
        lByte = (lValue >>> (lCount * 8)) & 255;
        WordToHexValueTemp = "0" + lByte.toString(16);
        WordToHexValue = WordToHexValue + WordToHexValueTemp.substr(WordToHexValueTemp.length - 2, 2)
    }
    return WordToHexValue
};
var uTF8Encode = function(string) {
    string = string.replace(/\x0d\x0a/g, "\x0a");
    var output = "";
    for (var n = 0; n < string.length; n++) {
        var c = string.charCodeAt(n);
        if (c < 128) {
            output += String.fromCharCode(c)
        } else if ((c > 127) && (c < 2048)) {
            output += String.fromCharCode((c >> 6) | 192);
            output += String.fromCharCode((c & 63) | 128)
        } else {
            output += String.fromCharCode((c >> 12) | 224);
            output += String.fromCharCode(((c >> 6) & 63) | 128);
            output += String.fromCharCode((c & 63) | 128)
        }
    }
    return output;
};
function md5(string) {

function encryptByDES(massage, keydata) {
        let cipher = Cipher.getInstance("DES");
        let keySpec = new DESKeySpec(String(keydata).getBytes());
         let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
         let key = keyFactory.generateSecret(keySpec);      
        cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE, key);
        return Base64.encodeToString(cipher.doFinal(String(massage).getBytes()),Base64.NO_WRAP)
}
}
